use_cases_desc:
Awareness tool
Spatial file sharing tool
evaluation: Technical evaluation (e.g., runtime, roundtrip); Quality measurements (e.g., accuracy of tracking)
contribution_desc: Relate system, which provides fine-grained relative position information to co-located devices on the basis of peer-to-peer sensing, thus overcoming dependence on any external infrastructure
tracking_tech: Custom tracking dongle; Radio; ultrasonic; Acoustic signals; Standalone
